html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12662024-11-29IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (International Experience Canada)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (INTERNATIONAL EXPERIENCE CANADA) in order to (1) provide a specific authority to issue a work permit to a foreign national who intends to work under a youth mobility agreement or arrangement between Canada and a foreign government, or between Canada and an international or domestic organization that would create or maintain reciprocal employment for Canadian citizens in a foreign state or territory; and (2) add the duration of work for any one employer to the list of work-related conditions an officer may impose on a temporary resident.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (INTERNATIONAL EXPERIENCE CANADA) in order to (1) provide a specific authority to issue a work permit to a foreign national who intends to work under a youth mobility agreement or arrangement between Canada and a foreign government, or between Canada and an international or domestic organization that would create or maintain reciprocal employment for Canadian citizens in a foreign state or territory; and (2) add the duration of work for any one employer to the list of work-related conditions an officer may impose on a temporary resident.
